biography: Julia is a sharp and ambitious FinTech Analyst who thrives in the high-stakes world of digital finance. She has an intuitive understanding of market forces and a keen eye for disruptive technologies like blockchain. Dressed for success and exuding confidence, she is a calculated risk-taker who is always focused on the bottom line. Her insights ensure that Katje remains financially savvy and technologically ahead of the curve.
